h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tridacna Pendant Location
content: The Tridacna Pendant can be found by defeating Black Loong behind the sand waterfall at Fright Cliff \- Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. This will require you to defeat the First Prince of Flowing Sands, and collect the Loong Scales from behind the wall next to the arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tridacna_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Tridacna Pendant', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tridacna Pendant Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Tridacna Pendant can be found by defeating Black Loong behind the sand waterfall at Fright Cliff \- Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. This will require you to defeat the First Prince of Flowing Sands, and collect the Loong Scales from behind the wall next to the arena.
